headline: Kroger Launches Fast, Convenient Delivery on Uber Apps Nationwide
summary: Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER) and The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced the launch of nearly 2,700 Kroger Family of Companies stores on the Uber Eats, Uber, and Postmates apps. Customers nationwide can now shop their local Kroger banner for fresh groceries, Kroger's Our Brands favorites, household essentials, and more with the convenience of on-demand and same day delivery via Uber's apps.
